title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official CLI and Go library for downloading, serving, and chatting with 70+ open-source LLMs on macOS, Linux, and Windows.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node, browsers, and edge runtimes.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama with sync & async APIs, embeddings, and tool-calling support.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package that wraps Ollama for chat, LLM, and embeddings interfaces.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Open-source ChatGPT-style web UI that connects to any local Ollama instance; supports RAG, multimodal, and admin settings.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent builder API, streaming chat, and embeddings support.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama providing idiomatic Ruby APIs for chat, generate, and embeddings.

title: ollama-cli (npm)
summary: Community-built Node CLI that wraps ollama-js for quick prompts and model management from the terminal.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into an inline coding copilot with autocomplete and explain features.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration enabling Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained C#/.NET client for Ollama with async streaming and chat completion support.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection and autoscaling.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up an Ollama service container for CI/CD pipelines to run LLM-based tests or code reviews.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Unofficial but actively maintained Rust crate providing typed async APIs to Ollama’s REST endpoints.

title: ollama-gpt-script
summary: GPTScript tools provider that lets GPTScript agents call any Ollama model as a tool for local LLM steps.
